person.persName: Benjamin Singleton (Marshall County, Indiana, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Marshall County, Indiana, farmer and soldier. Indiana native. Married to Dovey Elizabeth Singleton on September 13, 1859. Father of Francis L. Singleton and Niles A. Singleton. Farm laborer in Marshall County, Indiana, in 1860. Private in the 73rd Indiana Volunteer Infantry Regiment from August 1862 to December 1862. Died of disease at Nashville, Tennessee, on December 17, 1862.
